page.title: 13LAW AND ORDER
page.content: There is no{police station}in Lapford although there used to be a police house.It was closed down some years ago because it did not get used enough.Sometimes a {policeman}comes in a police car and stays down the village by the old peoples bungalows.The main crime in the village is burglaries.A{policeman} comes to the school to talk to the children about the green cross code and not talking to strangers,riding on a bicycle and lots of other things.The school has been burgled three times in the last four years.If a policeman is needed,you have to phone Credition.There is very litte { {vandalism }in the village yet some villages have a vandalism problem.
